questions.question_text:
A company uses Microsoft 365.

You need to identify the portal that users should use to install Office applications.

What should you identify?

DRAG DROP
-

A company uses Microsoft 365.

The company is evaluating which Zero Trust security policies to implement.

Which Zero Trust security principle should you recommend? To answer, drag the appropriate principles to the correct requirements. Each principle may be used once. more than once, or not at all. You may need to drag the split bar between panes or scroll to view content.

NOTE: Each correct selection is worth one point.

//IMG//

questions.question_text:
After acquiring a Microsoft 365 E5 subscription, you are tasked with applying security features.
You are currently configuring a security feature that allows you to protect against unidentified malware, viruses, and malicious URLs.
Which of the following is the feature you are configuring?

discussion.content: The name of “Microsoft Office 365 Advanced Threat Protection” is changed to “ Microsoft Defender for Office 365”.

IMPORTANT NOTE:
Microsoft Office 365 Advanced Threat Protection is now Microsoft Defender for Office 365. Select Microsoft Defender for Office 365 on the exam if you get this question.

O recurso que você está configurando para proteger contra malware, vírus e URLs maliciosos não identificados é a "Proteção Avançada contra Ameaças do Microsoft Office 365" (opção D). A Proteção Avançada contra Ameaças do Office 365 é uma solução de segurança que ajuda a proteger o ambiente do Office 365 contra ameaças cibernéticas, incluindo malware, vírus e URLs maliciosos.

Selected Answer: D
The answer is D.
Question needs to be updated. Needs to be labelled Defender for Office 365
D is related to security attack.
Thank you
